DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety fesoterodine comparison placebo overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-Finding Study To Evaluate The Efficacy , Tolerability And Safety Of Fesoterodine In Comparison To Placebo For Overactive Bladder .
DOC.criteria: Adult OAB patient present OAB symptom , include micturition > = 8 per day urgency urinary incontinence > = 1 per day . Patient known hypersensitivity active substance ( fesoterodine fumarate ) peanut soya excipients . Patient known neurological disease influence bladder function . Patient complication lower urinary tract pathology potentially responsible urgency incontinence , clinically relevant bladder outlet obstruction pelvic organ prolapse .
